channel.title: obsidian on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: How I track tasks with Obsidian
item.description: How I track tasks with Obsidian Hello. This will be a run-down on how I track tasks and projects and long-term things, like reading a book, tracking a project or traveling using the PARA method. Let’s get to it! Task tracking queue The way I track tasks is through a queuing system. To not get overloaded by tasks, I just simply put the next task into the queue and take out the top recent if I’m done.
